properties.name: Cidr
properties.description: Represents a single IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR

type.description: Represents a single IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR

properties.name: NetmaskLength
properties.description: The desired netmask length of the provision. If set, IPAM will choose a block of free space with this size and return the CIDR representing it.

type.description: The desired netmask length of the provision. If set, IPAM will choose a block of free space with this size and return the CIDR representing it.

properties.name: IpamPoolCidrId
properties.description: Id of the IPAM Pool Cidr.

type.description: Id of the IPAM Pool Cidr.
